name: Zombie Escape (KoGaMa2011)
description:
JUST AVOID THE ZOMBIES 

   CONTROLES:

Move your mouse to move your character

Z for shooting

F11 for fullscreen

M for turning on/off the music

Turning on/off the music have a little bit of problem,if you want to turn it off,keep pressing M until it works,same thing with turning it on
